member.summary: Gets all the values from given column in a given worksheet in a sequence.

member.summary: Gets all the values from given column in a given worksheet in a sequence.

member.name: M:ExcelPackageF.Excel.getContent(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet)
member.summary: Gets all the values from all the cells in a given worksheet in a sequence. The traversal is done line by line

member.summary: Gets the maximum column number for a given worksheet

member.summary: Gets the maximum row number for a given worksheet

member.name: M:ExcelPackageF.Excel.getWorksheets(System.String)
